vote.title: Authorize (1) the acceptance of a land donation from Commerce and South Ervay Streets from Slaughter Partners, LP, CCS Commerce A, LLC and CCS Commerce B, LLC; and (2) negotiations of a tenant lease of approximately 2,500 square feet of improved land located near the intersection of Commerce and Ervay Streets for the 1607 Commerce Street Land Dedication Project - Not to exceed $2,000.00, plus closing costs and title expenses - Financing: General Fund (This item was deferred on March 26, 2025)
vote.description: Authorize (1) the acceptance of a land donation from Commerce and South Ervay Streets from Slaughter Partners, LP, CCS Commerce A, LLC and CCS Commerce B, LLC; and (2) negotiations of a tenant lease of approximately 2,500 square feet of improved land located near the intersection of Commerce and Ervay Streets for the 1607 Commerce Street Land Dedication Project - Not to exceed $2,000.00, plus closing costs and title expenses - Financing: General Fund (This item was deferred on March 26, 2025)
